headline: Hershey vs. Mondelez: Which candy stocks are sweet as prices rise
summary: Americans are expected to spend $13 billion on Halloween this year, with rising candy prices in focus. Mizuho Americas managing director and senior consumer equity research analyst, John Baumgartner, joins Market Domination Overtime to discuss how to play candy stocks like Mondelez (MDLZ) and Hershey (HSY). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: United States Diabetic Food Market Trends and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Nestle, Unilever, Kellogg Co, Conagra Brands, Tyson Foods, The Hershey Co, and Hain Celestial
summary: The United States diabetic food market is projected to reach US$ 7.35 billion by 2033, growing from US$ 4.4 billion in 2024 at a CAGR of 5.85%. This growth is fueled by rising health consciousness, increased diabetes prevalence, and demand for low-calorie, low-sugar options. Consumer interest in blood glucose management is driving expansion, as is the innovation in snacks, drinks, and meal solutions. Retail and e-commerce channels enhance accessibility, while challenges include high product cost
